name: Biped's Journey
description:
Disclaimer: Game has Limited Functionality.

Arrow keys to move and Jump, A key to attack, S to use beam, Space for menu

The game was a school Project, showing how to make a game in flash. I hand-coded the game using ActionScript 2.0 and made the animations for the biped. I Added the game as a record for posterity, and to show my first short project.
